name: Paris - Tourism
description:
PARIS - TOURISM
The city of Tourism, Paris.
Let's build tourism city.
- Build Your own Airline.
- Tourist wants to a lot of Landmarks.
- You need Hotel for the many visitors.
- Let's make Department store in Paris.
- Airplane , TGV Train, Ships, Take all of the transportation.
- Build own Your University.
- You must be participate in gold auction when spring and autumn.
